sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import Pulse from 'react-reveal/Pulse' import {faEnvelope, faPhoneSquareAlt, faUserGraduate} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import '../../styles/contactItem.css' const ContactItem = ({id, name, email, phone, type, abilities, deleteContact, setContact}) => { let array = phone.toString().split("") array.splice(3, 0, "-") array.splice(7, 0, "-") phone = array.toString().split(",").join("") const onDelete = ()=> deleteContact(id) const onSetContact = ()=> { let contact = { id, name, email, phone: phone.split("-").join(""), abilities, type } setContact(contact) } return (

{name}

{email}
{phone}
Abilities:

{abilities}

{type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + type.slice(1)}
) } export default ContactItem
